title: Sitecore CMS exploit chain starts with hardcoded 'b' password
summary: A chain of Sitecore Experience Platform (XP) vulnerabilities allows attackers to perform remote code execution (RCE) without authentication to breach and hijack servers. [...]

title: UK fines 23andMe for ‘profoundly damaging’ breach exposing genetics data
summary: The UK Information Commissioner's Office (ICO) has fined genetic testing provider 23andMe £2.31 million ($3.12 million) over 'serious security failings' that led to a 'profoundly damaging' data breach in 2023. [...]

title: Microsoft fixes Surface Hub boot issues with emergency update
summary: Microsoft has released an emergency update to fix a known issue causing startup failures for some Surface Hub v1 devices running Windows 10. [...]

title: Hacker steals 1 million Cock.li user records in webmail data breach
summary: Email hosting provider Cock.li has confirmed it suffered a data breach after threat actors exploited flaws in its now-retired Roundcube webmail platform to steal over a million user records. [...]

title: Silver Fox APT Targets Taiwan with Complex Gh0stCringe and HoldingHands RAT Malware
summary:
Cybersecurity researchers are warning of a new phishing campaign that's targeting users in Taiwan with malware families such as HoldingHands RAT and Gh0stCringe.

summary:
The notorious cybercrime group known as Scattered Spider (aka UNC3944) that recently targeted various U.K. and U.S. retailers has begun to target major insurance companies, according to Google Threat Intelligence Group (GTIG).

summary:

summary:

title: Meta Starts Showing Ads on WhatsApp After 6-Year Delay From 2018 Announcement
summary:
Meta Platforms on Monday announced that it's bringing advertising to WhatsApp, but emphasized that the ads are "built with privacy in mind."
